0f00f7ae-49f5-4beb-a6a8-37c7db36b4f7.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "LNX101 - Command Line Basics" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on how to use a variety of commands that are useful to know when navigating the Linux command line interface.
0f00f7ae-49f5-4beb-a6a8-37c7db36b4f7.name: LNX101 - Command Line Basics

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

3927446c-2b87-4cab-bc83-f1315eafbba4.description: Earning this badge shows that the badgeholder has proven knowledge and skills in Network Forensics. Must show familiarity with the following concepts: Linux Basics, Firewalls and IDS, packet monitoring and decoding. Additionally, the following skills are tested in order to obtain this badge: networking monitoring, intrusion detection and prevention, and exploit creation and analysis.
3927446c-2b87-4cab-bc83-f1315eafbba4.name: CYBR1320: Network Forensics Class Completed

badge_template_activities.title: Achieved knowledge and skills in network forensics through lecture, guided labs, scored labs and assessments.

27f42542-4782-4ddd-9f5b-667daadfe0ac.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "LNX101 - File System Structure" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on the basic file system layout and structure in a typical Linux distribution.
27f42542-4782-4ddd-9f5b-667daadfe0ac.name: LNX101 - File System Structure

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

1a98f3c9-73b2-4ebd-bcab-54c497e89f9c.description: Earners of the CyberStronger "Leader" certification have demonstrated an advanced level of cybersecurity knowledge and competencies essential to developing secure code.
1a98f3c9-73b2-4ebd-bcab-54c497e89f9c.name: Secure Software Developer: C# Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Receive an average score of 90 or greater on four post-training assessments.

33148ec2-3bd5-4979-9b0e-5456ff00d8e1.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Additional Scanning Options" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on how to leverage Nmap, a network discovery and mapping tool, to identify the systems on a network of responsibility. Students will utilize non-traditional scans to attempt avoiding an Intrusion Detection System (IDS).
33148ec2-3bd5-4979-9b0e-5456ff00d8e1.name: Additional Scanning Options

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

7abfe71f-c759-4aed-a469-44087e08723b.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Creating SIEM Reports with Splunk" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on the creation of SIEM (Security Information and Event Management) reports using the SPLUNK tool.
7abfe71f-c759-4aed-a469-44087e08723b.name: Creating SIEM Reports with Splunk

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

70ff8a50-2513-460b-bde9-d902bc45a3b5.description: The earners of this CyberStronger "Apprentice" badge have demonstrated a foundational level of knowledge, skills and abilities essential in the Cyber Defense Analyst (CDA) NICE Workforce Framework job role. They have displayed basic command of using data collected from cyber defense tools (e.g., IDS alerts, firewalls, network traffic logs) to analyze events that occur within their environments for the purpose of mitigating threats.
70ff8a50-2513-460b-bde9-d902bc45a3b5.name: PR100: Cyber Defense Analyst (CDA) Apprentice

badge_template_activities.title: Achieved foundational knowledge and skills in cyber defense through lecture, guided labs, scored labs and assessments.
Achieved a score between 40 and 59 on the final Cyber Defense Analyst (CDA) assessments.

73d484cd-e326-4a22-b7a5-550082f227db.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Analyze and Update a Company BCP/BIA/DRP/CIRP" hands-on training lab. Earners gained familiarity with the Business Continuity Plan (BCP), Business Impact Assessment (BIA), Disaster Recovery Plan (DRP) and Computer Incident Response Plan (CIRP). Earners gained knowledge on how to perform a gap analysis using the provided BCP, BIAs and DRP, and make the necessary fixes to the DRP.
73d484cd-e326-4a22-b7a5-550082f227db.name: Analyze and Update a Company BCP/BIA/DRP/CIRP

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

7e722dc0-64ec-4765-88f5-cd8599831f73.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Wireshark" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge and a basic understanding of how to work with Wireshark to analyze network traffic.
7e722dc0-64ec-4765-88f5-cd8599831f73.name: Wireshark

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

f6e8d00e-5cbb-426d-a89e-728ccc9715f8.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Assess A High-Risk System" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on how systems that are required to provide remote or public customer access should be placed in a Demilitarized Zone (DMZ), a separate space set aside for public access outside the internal network. If public-facing (Internet) servers were hosted on the internal network then an attacker could easily breach the server and access sensitive material.
f6e8d00e-5cbb-426d-a89e-728ccc9715f8.name: Assess A High-Risk System

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

15049249-5260-430f-99e2-50f2d76b89d6.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Creation of Standard Operating Procedures for Recovery" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on how to perform necessary remediations to a vulnerable Windows server by applying a variety of patches, systems/firewall tweaks in order to further harden it. Earners then ran a follow-up scan to ensure the previously discovered weaknesses have been mitigated and finally author an SOP to assist others.
15049249-5260-430f-99e2-50f2d76b89d6.name: Creation of Standard Operating Procedures for Recovery

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

bcaffd93-c205-4643-b395-88710d625605.description: Earners of the CyberStronger "Leader" certification have demonstrated an advanced level of cybersecurity knowledge and competencies essential to developing secure code.
bcaffd93-c205-4643-b395-88710d625605.name: Secure Software Developer: C++ Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Receive an average score of 90 or greater on four post-training assessments.

9b744f5c-f90c-48e0-aad2-19eb57d5ca17.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Analyze SQL Injection Attack" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on how to Identify the use of an SQL Injection through the use of Wireshark. The earners also learned how to isolate the different aspects of the SQL Injection and execute the selected code.
9b744f5c-f90c-48e0-aad2-19eb57d5ca17.name: Analyze SQL Injection Attack

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

0b74c3b9-17c7-4aa6-993a-7aaf85932fc5.description: The earners of this CyberStronger "Specialist" badge have demonstrated an intermediate level of knowledge, skills and abilities essential in the Cyber Defense Analyst (CDA) NICE Workforce Framework job role. They have displayed standard command of using data collected from cyber defense tools (e.g., IDS alerts, firewalls, network traffic logs) to analyze events that occur within their environments for the purpose of mitigating threats.
0b74c3b9-17c7-4aa6-993a-7aaf85932fc5.name: PR100: Cyber Defense Analyst (CDA) Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Achieved intermediate knowledge and skills in cyber defense through lecture, guided labs, scored labs and assessments.
Achieved a score between 60 and 79 on the final Cyber Defense Analyst (CDA) assessments.

7e106276-43cb-489e-8658-395be3262bbc.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Advanced Techniques for Malware Recovery" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on how to use the SysInternals Suite of utilities to analyze processes, DLLs, registry edits and other auto start functions to locate and remove malicious software from an infected Windows 7 victim machine.
7e106276-43cb-489e-8658-395be3262bbc.name: Advanced Techniques for Malware Recovery

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

d1326a7b-b01a-4618-96e5-562954affc57.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Block Incoming Traffic on Known Port" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on how to respond to an incident by blocking incoming traffic on a known port from a specific IP.
d1326a7b-b01a-4618-96e5-562954affc57.name: Block Incoming Traffic on Known Port

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

f6a11584-c30b-4283-92a4-ba0059cc738b.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Cryptography: Man In the Middle Attack" hands-on training lab. After being placed in the middle of an encrypted chat session, earners gained knowledge on how to analyze the protocol, find the flaws, formulate an attack, and execute the attack.
f6a11584-c30b-4283-92a4-ba0059cc738b.name: Cryptography: Man In the Middle Attack

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

34eac446-d349-4bb6-aafb-bb559dded94a.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Identifying Malicious Network Connections" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge into investigating a cybersecurity incident and the importance to take memory snapshots of affected systems for further analysis. Earners successfully conducted an analysis and looked for malicious network connections, processes, and other artifacts.
34eac446-d349-4bb6-aafb-bb559dded94a.name: Identifying Malicious Network Connections

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

5c21ed1b-d73e-4bd5-b8c5-25ec41cb31a3.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Network Segmentation (FW/DMZ/WAN/LAN)" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on how to create three distinct areas for a network, route traffic accordingly and lock down VPN access to the appropriate IP address.
5c21ed1b-d73e-4bd5-b8c5-25ec41cb31a3.name: Network Segmentation (FW/DMZ/WAN/LAN)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

43c9715b-fa74-4146-9162-4f00c8c1a8b0.description: Earners of the CyberStronger "Apprentice" certification have demonstrated a foundational level of cybersecurity knowledge and competencies essential to developing secure code.
43c9715b-fa74-4146-9162-4f00c8c1a8b0.name: Secure Software Developer: C# Apprentice

badge_template_activities.title: Receive an average score between 60 and 89 on four post-training assessments.

fcab92d0-0075-41b2-b430-ce817f0626b6.description: Earners of the CyberStronger "Apprentice" certification have demonstrated a foundational level of cybersecurity knowledge and competencies essential to the field services operations.
fcab92d0-0075-41b2-b430-ce817f0626b6.name: Field Technologist Apprentice

badge_template_activities.title: Receive an average score between 60 and 89 on four post-training assessments.

71abe54f-e8b7-4301-83fc-a0210ad5e811.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Introduction To OWASP Top Ten: Capstone" hands-on lab. Earners gained knowledge on the OWASP Top Ten vulnerabilities all incorporated into one sample website. The OWASP Top 10 is a standard awareness document for developers and web application security. It represents a broad consensus about the most critical security risks to web applications.
71abe54f-e8b7-4301-83fc-a0210ad5e811.name: Introduction To OWASP Top Ten: Capstone

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

919b2edc-7744-4302-8bf0-94f6ab5c7c3d.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "Penetration Tester Challenge" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on how to Hack a Network and Deface the corporate Web Server. Earners completed a series of tasks designed to enumerate and identify potential system and network vulnerabilities, exploit systems and/or networks based on vulnerability discoveries, recover system user credentials and use them to pivot onto other information systems in the network(s).
919b2edc-7744-4302-8bf0-94f6ab5c7c3d.name: Penetration Tester Challenge

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

9f82a65f-c3b2-4499-8af3-4fe00c08b22c.description: Earners of the CyberStronger "Apprentice" certification have demonstrated a foundational level of cybersecurity knowledge and competencies essential to developing secure code.
9f82a65f-c3b2-4499-8af3-4fe00c08b22c.name: Secure Software Developer: Java Apprentice

badge_template_activities.title: Receive an average score between 60 and 89 on four post-training assessments.

aec3b9dd-4ac3-445a-9cca-b5b93ed3892d.description: Earners of this CyberStronger badge have successfully completed the "WebApp Attack PCAP Analysis" hands-on training lab. Earners gained knowledge on how to analyze a capture file of a web application attack in order to identify the attack vector and deduce the vulnerability the attack exploited.
aec3b9dd-4ac3-445a-9cca-b5b93ed3892d.name: WebApp Attack PCAP Analysis

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a hands-on training lab in cybersecurity.

c2e3b9d5-a599-41b7-91ef-6d21ece16c4c.description: Earning this badge shows that the badgeholder has proven knowledge and skills in how to identify and analyze the presence of advanced packers, polymorphic malware, encrypted malware, and malicious code that has been armored with cryptors, anti-debugging and anti-reverse engineering.
c2e3b9d5-a599-41b7-91ef-6d21ece16c4c.name: CYBR4500: Advanced Malware Analysis Class Completed

badge_template_activities.title: Achieved knowledge and skills in malware forensics through lecture, guided labs, scored labs and assessments.

e01a5893-d911-4698-9035-a08f40aca6fa.name: Secure Software Developer: Python Apprentice

badge_template_activities.title: Receive an average score between 60 and 89 on four post-training assessments.

1feea851-c863-4e07-9a63-1a007feaad4d.description: The earners of this badge have successfully completed the Incident Response & Forensics course and have acquired the knowledge related to protecting modern computer networks and systems from intrusion, and processes/procedures to recover from breached defenses. They also learned how to explore file systems, partition structures, media collection, imaging and data storage to better understand how and where data is stored on multiple digital media types, as well as the best methods to access it.
1feea851-c863-4e07-9a63-1a007feaad4d.name: Incident Response & Forensics Course Completed

badge_template_activities.title: Achieved knowledge and skills in Incident Response and Forensics through lectures, guided labs, scored labs and capstones.

6cae7f63-04ab-4e08-8f81-1e5158f5c86e.description: The earners of this badge have successfully completed the Ultimate Hacking Expert course and have gained a strong foundation in the Python scripting language at the intermediate level. They have acquired the competency in scripting and building Python tools critical across a variety of development and information security scenarios, including scanners, exploits, web application attack tools, and more.
6cae7f63-04ab-4e08-8f81-1e5158f5c86e.name: Ultimate Hacking Expert Course Completed

badge_template_activities.title: Achieved knowledge and skills in ethical hacking through lecture, guided labs, scored labs and capstones
